member.name: M:Joker.App.SetMainPageToDefault

member.summary: References the current main page's timeline feed page.

member.summary: References the current main page's contact page.

member.name: T:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformContactPicker
member.summary: A custom API for the shared code that abstracts away the platform-specific contact and address book services of the target systems.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformContactPicker.PickContact
member.summary: Picks a single contact from the contact list through a platform-supplied view.
member.returns: A contact with first and last name and phone number. Returns null if the picking process was cancelled or the contact has no phone number recorded.

member.name: T:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformFileSaver
member.summary: A custom API for the shared code that abstracts away the platform-specific file IO services of the target systems.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformFileSaver.SaveToGallery(System.String)
member.summary: Saves a picture's file to the user's personal storage and indicates whether the process was successful.
member.param: File path to the image resource.
member.returns: True if the file could be saved, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier
member.summary: A custom API for the shared code that abstracts away the platform-specific push notification services of the target systems specifically for use in this app.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier.ScheduleLimitExpired(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Schedules a notification indicating the current limit has expired and a new one should be set.
member.param: The time at which the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier.CancelLimitExpired
member.summary: Removes the notification that indicates that the current limit has expired.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier.ScheduleNewPicture(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Schedules a notification indicating that a new picture is available to see.
member.param: The time at which the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier.ScheduleGambleReminder(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Schedules a notification reminding the user to always record acts of gambling within the app.
member.param: The interval for the times the notification should appear.

member.name: M:Joker.AppInterface.IPlatformNotifier.ScheduleLimitReminder(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Schedules a notification reminding the user about the current state of their limit.
member.param: The interval for the times the notification should appear.

member.summary: The maximum string length for the contact's name.

member.summary: The maximum string length for the contact's phone number.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.Id
member.summary: The numeric identifier for a contact in the database.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.Name
member.summary: The name associated with this contact.

member.summary: The phone number associated with this contact.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.MarkedAsExpert
member.summary: Indicates whether this contact is marked by the user as a professional or expert such as the number of a counseling center.

member.summary: The constructor that should be used when a contact is created from user input.

The phone number as supplied from the user.
Indicates whether the user has marked this contact as a professional contact.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.#ctor
member.summary: The constructor to be used by SQLite database interactions and direct data manipulation.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.op_Equality(Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact,Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact)
member.summary: Compares two contacts on whether their phone numbers are the same, eliminating whitespace for comparison.
member.param: The left operand on comparing equality.
The right operand on comparing equality.
member.returns: Whether the contacts are equal by their phone number.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact.op_Inequality(Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact,Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact)
member.summary: Compares two contacts on whether their phone numbers are different, eliminating whitespace for comparison.
member.param: The left operand on comparing inequality.
The right operand on comparing inequality.
member.returns: Whether the contacts are different by their phone number.

member.summary: Creates an identical clone of a contact.
member.returns: A deep copy of the contact.

member.summary: Contains the properties of a contact.
member.returns: A one-line string that represents this contact.

member.summary: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current object.

member.summary: Serves as the default hash function.
member.returns: A hash code for the current object.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble
member.summary: A gamble is an act of spending for gambling purposes, used to calculate how much of each limit has been depleted.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.MaxDescriptionLength
member.summary: Maximum length of a gamble's description.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.Type
member.summary: The type this gamble is classified as.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.Description
member.summary: Optional description given verbatim by the user.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.#ctor(System.String,Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor used when the user doesn't specify a time.
member.param: The amount as put in by the user.
The type as selected by the user.
The description as given by the user.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.#ctor(System.DateTime,System.String,Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor used when the user specifies a time.
member.param: The time as selected by the user.
The amount as given by the user.
The type as selected by the user.
The description as given by the user.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor only exists for cloning and for SQLite to be able to return collections of Gambles from the database. It should never be used to instantiate a Gamble directly within the app.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.Copy
member.summary: Creates an identical clone of a gamble.
member.returns: A deep copy of the gamble.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble.ToString
member.summary: Contains the database-relevant properties of this gamble.
member.returns: A one-line string that represents this gamble.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType
member.summary: Contains the different types a gamble can be classified as, usually the kind of institution where the money was spent.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType.Other
member.summary: The default type.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType.Lottery
member.summary: Indicates a lottery, such as LOTTO 6aus49 or Eurojackpot.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType.SportsBet
member.summary: Indicates a sports betting institution, such as ODDSET or Tipico.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType.Casino
member.summary: Indicates a casino or "gambling house" of any kind.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType.SlotMachine
member.summary: Indicates a gamble on a slot machine of some kind.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleTypes
member.summary: Encapsulates logic concerning the GambleType enumeration.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleTypes.names
member.summary: Holds the translated German terms for each type of gamble.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleTypes.Names
member.summary: Returns the translated German terms of the gamble types in order.
member.returns: An array of strings based on the values of a dictionary.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleTypes.GetName(Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleType)
member.summary: Gets the translated German term for the supplied gamble type.
member.param: The gamble type constant whose translation should be given.
member.returns: The translated term as a string.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.GambleTypes.GetGambleType(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the first key in the dictionary whose name equals the parameter.
member.param: Translated name of the gamble type for which the type should be returned.
member.returns: The gamble type belonging to the supplied translated name.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit

member.summary: The minimum allowed duration of a limit.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit.MaxLimitDuration
member.summary: The maximum allowed duration of a limit.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit.Duration
member.summary: The time span after which this limit should have been replaced with a new one.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The standard constructor that should be used every time a new limit must be set.
member.param: The amount as put in by the user.
The duration in days as put in by the user.
member.exception: Thrown if the duration parameter couldn't be parsed or the parsed duration isn't within the allowed bounds.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor only exists for SQLite to be able to return collections of Limits from the database. It should never be used to instantiate a Limit directly within the app.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit.ToString
member.summary: Contains the database-relevant properties of this limit.
member.returns: A one-line string that represents this limit.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture
member.summary: Represents a motivating or informing picture in the database and in the app view.

member.summary: The file path of the image resource associated with the picture, used as a primary key.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture.TimeAdded
member.summary: The time this picture was added to the database.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture.Liked
member.summary: The status indicating whether this picture is preferred by the user, which makes the picture appear more often by the randomized refresh in the picture feed.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: The standard constructor for this class. Creates a picture based on the given file path and sets its properties to their default value.
member.param: The file path of the embedded image resource.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor only exists for SQLite to be able to return collections of Pictures from the database. It should never be used to instantiate a Picture directly within the app.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture.ToString
member.summary: Contains the database-relevant properties of this picture.
member.returns: A one-line string that represents this picture.

member.name: T:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord
member.summary: Base class for gambles and limits, as they are recordings of gambling or self-imposed limits by the user that can be ordered chronologically.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.MinAmount
member.summary: The minimum amount for a gamble or a limit.

member.name: F:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.MaxAmount
member.summary: The maximum amount for a gamble or a limit.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.Time
member.summary: The time at which the gamble occurred or the limit has been set.

member.name: P:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.Amount
member.summary: The amount relevant to this gamble or limit.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor called for limits as well as gambles that don't have a user-specified time.
member.param: The amount as put in by the user.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.#ctor(System.DateTime,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor called only for gambles with a user-specified time.
member.param: The time as specified by the user.
The amount as put in by the user.
member.exception: Thrown if the time parameter specifies a future time.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.#ctor
member.summary: This constructor is necessary for the subclasses to be instantiated by SQLite in database queries.

member.name: M:Joker.BusinessLogic.TimelineRecord.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: A parsing function to get a decimal monetary value from user input.
member.param: The amount to be parsed as put in by the user.
member.returns: A monetary value in decimal form.
member.exception: Thrown if the amount parameter couldn't be parsed or isn't within the allowed bounds.

member.name: T:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings
member.summary: A wrapper class that simplifies access to persistent preferences concerning app operations.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.DatabaseFilePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path of the database file.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.WelcomeTourCompleted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the user welcome tour was completed.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.UserPasswordIsSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the checking condition whether the user has protected the app with a password.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.FirstSecurityQuestionIsSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the checking condition whether the user has set their first security question.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.SecondSecurityQuestionIsSet
member.summary: Gets or sets the checking condition whether the user has set their second security question.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.LimitExpiredTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time when the current active limit expires and a new one must be set.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.AppSettings.NewPictureTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time when the availability of a new picture should be notified to the user.

member.name: T:Joker.DataAccess.Database
member.summary: A utility class containing all methods that interact with the app's local database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Initialize
member.summary: Ensures all necessary tables for database operations exist before they are performed.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Insert(Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit)
member.summary: Inserts the specified Limit object into the database.
member.param: The limit to be inserted.
member.exception: Thrown if a limit with the parameter's time property already exists in the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Insert(Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble)
member.summary: Safely inserts a Gamble object into the database. Contains input validation.
member.param: The gamble to be inserted.
member.exception: Thrown if the parameter's time property is earlier than the first limit's time.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Insert(Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact)
member.summary: Inserts a contact into the database when there is no other contact with the same phone number.
member.param: The contact to be inserted.
member.exception: Thrown if a contact with the same phone number already exists in the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.InsertPictureFromRandomResource
member.summary: Selects a random image resource from the PictureFeed folder and inserts it as a Picture object into the database. Prevents duplicate images.
member.returns: Returns whether a random picture could be inserted, "true" indicating success.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.CountLimits
member.summary: Counts the number of limits stored in the database.
member.returns: Number of rows of the Limit table.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.AllGamblesAndLimits
member.summary: Joins the Gamble and Limit tables, copying them as an array of timeline records sorted by their Time property from newest to oldest.
member.returns: An array of all gambles and limits, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.AllContacts
member.summary: Gets a copy of all contact entries in the database, from newest to oldest.
member.returns: An array of contacts, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.AllPictures
member.summary: Gets a copy of all picture entries in the database.
member.returns: A list of pictures, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.LikedPictures
member.summary: Gets a copy of all picture entries in the database marked as liked.
member.returns: An array of pictures marked as liked, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.MostRecentLimit
member.summary: Gets a copy of the most recent limit added to the database.
member.returns: A single Limit instance, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.MostRecentPicture
member.summary: Returns a copy of the most recent picture added to the database.
member.returns: A single Picture instance, unbound to the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.NoGambleAfterMostRecentLimit
member.summary: Indicates whether the user has entered a gamble after the most recent limit has been set.
member.returns: True when there are no gambles after the most recent limit, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.NextLimitAfter(Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit)
member.summary: Returns the limit stored after the specified limit or null if no such limit exists.
member.param: The limit whose following limit is to be found.
member.returns: The limit directly after the argument or null.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.AllGamblesWithinLimit(Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit)
member.summary: Returns all gambles lying within the duration of a specific limit.
member.param: The limit whose gambles are searched for.
member.returns: All gambles within the duration of the limit in an array.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.CalcBalance(Joker.BusinessLogic.Limit)
member.summary: Returns how much of a limit's amount has been consumed by the gambles within its duration.
member.param: The limit whose balance should be calculated.
member.returns: How much of the limit remains as a decimal number.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.CalcPreviousLimitBalance
member.summary: Returns how much of the second most recent limit's amount has been depleted by the user's gambling records.
member.returns: The current balance of the limit as a decimal.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.CalcRemainingLimit(Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble)
member.summary: Calculates the remaining limit amount chronologically after a particular gamble.
member.param: The gamble whose remaining limit should be calculated.
member.returns: The decimal amount of the limit minus all relevant gambles' amounts.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.ToggleLikedStatus(Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture)
member.summary: Switches the Liked status of the supplied picture in the database if it exists.
member.param: The picture whose Liked status should be toggled.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Update(Joker.BusinessLogic.Gamble)
member.summary: Updates the specified gamble in the database.
member.param: The gamble to be updated.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Update(Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact)
member.summary: Updates the specified contact in the database.
member.param: The contact to be updated.
member.exception: Thrown if another contact with the parameter contact's phone number already exists in the database.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Delete(Joker.BusinessLogic.Contact)
member.summary: Deletes the specified contact in the database.
member.param: The contact to be deleted.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.Database.Delete(Joker.BusinessLogic.Picture)
member.summary: Deletes the specified picture in the database.
member.param: The picture to be deleted.

member.name: T:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings
member.summary: A wrapper class that simplifies access to persistent preferences concerning the user directly.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MaxNameLength
member.summary: The maximum string length of the user name.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.UserName
member.summary: The name used to address the user in personalized texts or push notifications.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this to an empty string or exceeds the maximum allowed length.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.PreferredAspect
member.summary: The preferred aspect to use in the picture feed as set by the user.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MaxPasswordLength
member.summary: The maximum string length of the user password.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.UserPassword
member.summary: The optional password with which the user can protect access to the app's UI.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this property to a text that is longer than the maximum allowed length or doesn't contain anything except alphanumeric characters.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MaxSecurityEntryLength
member.summary: The maximum string length for either a security question or answer.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.FirstSecurityQuestion
member.summary: Holds the text of the first security question.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this property to a text that is longer than the maximum allowed length or is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.FirstSecurityAnswer
member.summary: Holds the text of the answer to the first security question.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this property to a text that is longer than the maximum allowed length or is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.SecondSecurityQuestion
member.summary: Holds the text of the second security question.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this property to a text that is longer than the maximum allowed length or is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.SecondSecurityAnswer
member.summary: Holds the text of the answer to the second security question.
member.exception: Thrown if the user tries to set this property to a text that is longer than the maximum allowed length or is a null or empty string.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MinNewPictureInterval
member.summary: The minimum allowed time span between two new pictures, which is 2 days.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MaxNewPictureInterval
member.summary: The maximum allowed time span between two new pictures, which is 28 days.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.NewPictureInterval
member.summary: The time span between two new pictures. The default value is 2 days.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.SetNewPictureInterval(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the time span between two new pictures from a user-supplied text string.
member.param: User input from an entry to be parsed.
member.exception: Thrown if the argument couldn't be parsed or isn't within the allowed TimeSpan bounds.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MinReminderInterval
member.summary: The minimum allowed time span between two reminders, which is 2 hours.

member.name: F:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.MaxReminderInterval
member.summary: The maximum allowed time span between two reminders, which is 200 hours.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.GambleReminderInterval
member.summary: The time span between two push notifications, that remind the user that he should always record his acts of gambling in the app.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.SetGambleReminderInterval(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the time span between two gambling reminders from a user-supplied text string.
member.param: User input from an entry to be parsed.

member.name: P:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.LimitReminderInterval
member.summary: The time span between two push notifications, that remind the user about the current state of their limit.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.SetLimitReminderInterval(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the time span between two limit reminders from a user-supplied text string.
member.param: User input from an entry to be parsed.

member.name: M:Joker.DataAccess.UserSettings.ParseReminderInterval(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a user input string from the settings page according the bounds of reminder notifications.
member.param: String to be parsed.
member.returns: The parsed time span.
member.exception: Thrown if the argument couldn't be parsed or isn't within the allowed TimeSpan bounds.
